tool_description: Matches wood species to project requirements based on strength, workability, appearance, and durability characteristics.

candidate_species.description: List of wood species to evaluate

grain_preference.description: Preferred grain pattern (tight, medium, open, figured, any)

workability_needs.description: Required workability level (easy, moderate, challenging, any)

color_preference.description: Preferred wood color family (light, medium, dark, any)

error_messages: Empty species list: Provide at least one wood species to evaluate
Too many species: Limit evaluation to 20 species maximum for performance
Invalid strength requirement: Use one of [low, medium, high]
Invalid grain preference: Use one of [tight, medium, open, figured, any]
Invalid moisture resistance: Use one of [low, medium, high]
Invalid workability needs: Use one of [easy, moderate, challenging, any]
Invalid color preference: Use one of [light, medium, dark, any]
usage: Provide a list of candidate species and specify all requirements. The tool ranks species by suitability match percentage.

ranked_species.description: Species names ranked by suitability (best first)

match_percentages.description: Suitability match percentages for each ranked species

strength_ratings.description: Strength ratings for each ranked species

workability_ratings.description: Workability assessments for each ranked species
